channel.title: Need help with Vote System - GTL - Callback code
channel.description:
Hi guys, I need help with my vote system...
I'm currently using gtl vote system. I don't know how to mess with php/callback
So if your willing to help. Please let me know.
Currently looking for a webdeveloper as well.
Skype: ayye.geo

item.title: Need help with Vote System - GTL - Callback code
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Rarely anyone on these forums knows how to place a cache in their c: drive to be honest, but good luck finding someone to help you!

I’m just going to go ahead and report your post as spam. As that is all it is. The point of this section is 1 of 2 things: Help, or get help. You’re doing neither of them here. Instead you’re actually criticizing the users (as a whole). I can guarantee there are plenty of users here that are more than capable of “placing a cache in their C:/ drive”, I can also guarantee there are users here that can code an entire server from scratch. That is a hell of a lot more than I’ve ever seen you do, so you have no room to talk.

OP:
Can you post more information on your issue? Are you having an issue getting/making the callback links? or what?
GTLVote script made it rather easy, and you don’t even have to modify any PHP to add links…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Vote System - GTL - Callback code
